frontmatter.title: AWS Target Group Binding
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for AWS Target Group Binding
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Expose your pods using an existing ALB TargetGroup or NLB TargetGroup.
Allows you to provision the load balancer infrastructure completely outside of Kubernetes.
Used by AWS LoadBalancer controller internally to  support the functionality for Ingress and Service resource as well.
